title: HELP MEEE!!
body: Whether someone can help me, I have not played a game for a long time, I was given my friend to play, but he got a parliamentary ban because of bothering other players, is there any way to regain my account because I invested a lot of money to buy skins Now I'm starting to play again after a long time. Thanks to everyone in advance

replies.body: Thanks a lot for the answer, just how can I contact the agents, because I was really sorry about that account, that I got it would not be bad for me, but a lot of time and effort I invested, I played on that account by 2010 to 2015

[**Account Sharing**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204214670) is strictly against the ToS for various reasons, one of the biggest being this particular scenario. You can hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to verify yourself as the original creator to hopefully get access back, but any punishments will likely stay.
account sharing is against rules in the first place.
